ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/azure-ai-document-processing-samples
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A collection of samples demonstrating techniques for processing documents with Azure AI including AI Foundry, OpenAI, Document Intelligence, etc.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/get-started-with-ai-agents
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Basic sample for deploying AI agents web app with Azure AI Foundry and SDKs

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/get-started-with-ai-chat
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Basic sample for deploying chat web apps with Azure AI Foundry and SDKs

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/openai-chat-app-quickstart
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A simple chat application that uses managed identity for Azure OpenAI access. Designed for deployment on Azure Container Apps with the Azure Developer CLI.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure/ALZ-Bicep
ns0:entry.ns0:content: This repository contains the Azure Landing Zones (ALZ) Bicep modules that help deliver and deploy the Azure Landing Zone conceptual architecture in a modular approach. https://aka.ms/alz/docs

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure/GPT-RAG
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Sharing the learning along the way we been gathering to enable Azure OpenAI at enterprise scale in a secure manner. GPT-RAG core is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure Cognitive Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure/bicep
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Bicep is a declarative language for describing and deploying Azure resources

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/SonarSource/sonar-scanning-examples
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Shows how to use the Scanners

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/github-copilot-resources/copilot-metrics-viewer
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Tool to visualize the Copilot metrics provided via the Copilot Business Metrics API
